page.title: 02Population of Four Lanes.
page.content: The population of Four Lanes and surrounding area is estimated to be two thousand people,80% of these live in the village The village people are one third Cornish,two thirds "foreigners".It is noticeable that the newer,younger people live in the more modern houses, the Cornish families occupy the older more traditional granite built dwellings.The community is quite a changing one due to R.N.A.S.Culdrose and cheaper housing than in Redruth, three miles away.Outside the village some of the smallholdings are bought by up-country people to raise a few animals and live a self-help life style few last long,other properites are used as holiday or second homes and stand empty for quite long periods. .
